Dated: - 27/05/2014

AVSEC Circular no. - 06/2014

Subject: Permission for carriage of arms, ammunition and explosives by Department
of Home, Government of Maharashtra.

A copy of DGCA permit no. 360-AA/2014, issued under reference no,
8/33/2009-IR dated 12/05/2014 regarding authorization to the Department of Home,
Government of Maharashtra for carriage of arms, ammunition and explosives from
time to time in the Dauphin helicopter of Government of Maharashtra leased from
Pawan Hans Private Ltd., for transportation of troops in connection with anti-naxalite
operations in Maharashtra and adjoining States subject to the usual safety conditions,
is forwarded herewith for information and necessary action by all concerned.

2. This permit is valid upto 31/12/2014.

3. This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation).

Enel.: as above, 3 ie

(RN. Dhoke, IPS)

PERMIT No. 360-AA/2014 ies

In exercise of the powers under rule 8 of the Aircraft Rules, 1937,
Department of Home, Govt, of Maharashtra is hereby permitted to carry or
cause to carry the arms, ammunition and explosives from time to time in the
Dauphin helicopter of Govt. of Maharashtra leased from Pawan Hans Private
Lid., for transportation of troops in connection with anti-naxalite operations. in
Maharashtra and adjoining States subject to the usual safety conditions

2. This permit is valid upto 31-12-2014.
